name: Tofu Stir Fry
steps: Simmer tofu for 2 minutes in a medium pot of salted boiling water
Cut tofu to pieces and toss together with soy souce and seame oil
Heat a large skillet, add tofu and let cook until golden

name: Baked Tofu
steps: Pat tofu dry and cut into 32 equal pieces
Make marinade by mixing ginger and sesame oil
Preheat oven to 400 degrees and carefully mix tofu with the marinade. Sprinkle with cornstarch
Spead tofu out onto a baking sheet and bake for 15 minutes
